title: Post Game: Roe reversal upends the midterms math, with Garrett Haake
description: The Supreme Court's Friday reversal of the constitutional right to abortion has thrown lawmakers and those vying for office into a political reality unrecognizable moments prior. NBC News Senior Capitol Hill correspondent Garrett Haake joins Chuck to break down the state of politics in a post-Roe America.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
